PyUncertainNumber.pba.cbox.cbox_ancillary
=========================================

.. py:module:: PyUncertainNumber.pba.cbox.cbox_ancillary

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   ancillary codes for cbox written by Scott which are originally in R
   are translated to Python by the author of this snippet.
   - mostly can be ignored



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   PyUncertainNumber.pba.cbox.cbox_ancillary.many
   PyUncertainNumber.pba.cbox.cbox_ancillary.Bzero
   PyUncertainNumber.pba.cbox.cbox_ancillary.Bone
